items.title: Common Exponential Kernel Structure
items.content:
2533: :label: obs-common-kernel-structure
2534: 
2535: Both mechanisms express expected measurements as **quotients of exponentially weighted sums**:
2536: 
2537: **Softmax**:
2538: 
2539: $$
2540: d_j = \frac{\sum_{\ell \in \mathcal{A} \setminus \{j\}} d_{\text{alg}}(j,\ell) \exp(-d_{\text{alg}}^2(j,\ell)/(2\varepsilon_c^2))}{\sum_{\ell \in \mathcal{A} \setminus \{j\}} \exp(-d_{\text{alg}}^2(j,\ell)/(2\varepsilon_c^2))}
2541: 
2542: $$
2543: 
2544: **Diversity Pairing** (idealized):
2545: 
2546: $$
2547: \bar{d}_j = \frac{\sum_{M \in \mathcal{M}_k} d_{\text{alg}}(j, M(j)) W(M)}{\sum_{M' \in \mathcal{M}_k} W(M')}
2548: 
2549: $$
2550: 
2551: where $W(M) = \prod_{(i,\ell) \in M} \exp(-d_{\text{alg}}^2(i,\ell)/(2\varepsilon_{\text{pair}}^2))$.
2552: 
2553: **Key Similarity**: Both are:
2554: - Smooth quotients (denominator bounded below by companion availability)
